mapper.select: select B_S2_00801.ID, B_S2_00801.MAINID, B_S2_00801.ZT,B_S2_00801.WHDWID, B_S2_00801.WHRID, B_S2_00801.WHSJ, B_S2_00801.CX_BS, B_S2_00801.CX_ZJQDID, B_S2_00801.CX_SJ, B_S2_00801.CX_BZ, B_S2_00801.CX_WCKCID, B_S2_00801.CX_KCLVID, B_S2_00801.ZS_BS, B_S2_00801.ZS_ZJQDID, B_S2_00801.ZS_SJ, B_S2_00801.ZS_BZ, B_S2_00801.ZS_WCKCID, B_S2_00801.ZS_KCLVID, B_S2_00801.BZ, b_s2_004.bjh zs_bjh,b_s2_004.xlh zs_xlh,b_s2_004.zwmc zs_zwms,b_s2_004.ywmc zs_ywms, b_s2_002.bjh cx_bjh,b_s2_002.xlh cx_xlh,b_s2_002.zwmc cx_zwms,b_s2_002.ywmc cx_ywms from B_S2_00801 left join b_s2_004 on B_S2_00801.cx_zjqdid = b_s2_004.id left join b_s2_002 on B_S2_00801.zs_zjqdid = b_s2_002.id where B_S2_00801.zt = 1 and B_S2_00801.mainid = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT S200801.ID, S200801.MAINID, S200801.ZT, S200801.CX_BS, S200801.CX_ZJQDID, S200801.CX_SJ, S200801.CX_BZ, S200801.CX_WCKCID, S200801.CX_KCLVID, S200801.ZS_BS, S200801.ZS_ZJQDID, S200801.ZS_SJ, S200801.ZS_BZ, S200801.ZS_WCKCID, S200801.ZS_KCLVID, S2004.ID CXJID, S2004.WZ CXJWZ, S2004.CJ CXJCJ, S2004.BJH CXJBJH, S2004.XLH CXJXLH, S2004.PCH CXJPCH, S2002.ID ZSJID, S2002.WZ ZSJWZ, S2002.FJDID ZSJFJDID, S2002.BJH ZSJBJH, S2002.XLH ZSJXLH, S2002.PCH ZSJPCH FROM B_S2_00801 S200801 LEFT JOIN B_S2_004 S2004 ON S200801.CX_ZJQDID = S2004.ID LEFT JOIN B_S2_002 S2002 ON S200801.ZS_ZJQDID = S2002.ID WHERE S200801.ZT=1 and S200801.MAINID = #{mainid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE B_S2_0060401 S20060401 SET (cx_bs, cx_zjqdid, cx_sj, cx_bz, cx_wckcid, cx_kclvid, zs_bs, zs_zjqdid, zs_sj, zs_bz, zs_wckcid, zs_kclvid, zrrid, zrr) = (select S200801.cx_bs, S200801.cx_zjqdid, S200801.cx_sj, S200801.cx_bz, S200801.cx_wckcid, S200801.cx_kclvid, S200801.zs_bs, S200801.zs_zjqdid, S200801.zs_sj, S200801.zs_bz, S200801.zs_wckcid, S200801.zs_kclvid, S200801.zrrid, S200801.zrr FROM B_S2_00801 S200801 WHERE S200801.ID = S20060401.gdczjlid) WHERE S20060401.gdczjlid = #{gdczjlid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE B_S2_00801 SET ZS_WCKCID = #{kcid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZS_KCLVID = #{kcllid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE B_S2_00801 SET CX_WCKCID = #{kcid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CX_KCLVID = #{kcllid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
